General.Name: SZZT Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: SZZT Electronics CO.,LTD provides financial payment information security products primarily in China and internationally. The company offers self-service, payment, tax control, and EPP products, as well as parts; and provides data center solutions and cloud services. It serves the real estate, banking, smart retail, transportation, tourism, and hospital industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Zhengtong Electronics Industrial Park, Shenzhen, China, 518132

1.Name: Mr. Zhongci  Xu
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Sec. of the Board of Directors and Director
